relevant_findings.general: Alert and oriented, no acute distress.
relevant_findings.HEENT: No scleral icterus, mucous membranes dry.
relevant_findings.cardiovascular: Regular rate and rhythm, no murmurs, gallops, or rubs.
relevant_findings.pulmonary: Clear to auscultation bilaterally, no wheezes, rhonchi, or rales.
relevant_findings.abdominal: Soft, nondistended, tenderness to palpation in RUQ greater than LUQ, some referral of pain to RUQ from palpation of RLQ and LLQ; rebound tenderness noted but no guarding, normoactive bowel sounds, no palpable masses.
relevant_findings.extremities: No edema, tenderness of right shin with no bruising or skin changes, warm and well-perfused.
